AFTER:
input_size=None,
        input_shape=None,
        eps=1e-05,
        elementwise_affine=True,
    ):
        super().__init__()
        self.eps = eps
        self.elementwise_affine = elementwise_affine

        if input_shape is not None:
            input_size = input_shape[2:]

        self.norm = torch.nn.LayerNorm(
            input_size,
            eps=self.eps,
            elementwise_affine=self.elementwise_affine,
        )
